wines.name: Carlo Rossi
wines.text: Carlo Rossi Sweet Red wine is medium-bodied with rich berry flavors, hints of bright red fruits, and fresh floral notes. The wine is layered with sweet vanilla, caramel and floral aromas. Subtle notes of bright red berries and citrus fruits add to the rich flavor which translates into a nice crisp finish.

wines.name: Sutter Home
wines.text: Fresh honeydew melon, grapefruit, and passion fruit aromas with a bit of spice. Pinot Noir – Violet, black cherry, and raspberry aromas set the stage for cherry cola and berry jam flavors with hints of spice. Merlot – Black cherry flavors and hints of smoke and herbal spice.20 Mar 2017

wines.name: Woodbridge Mondavi
wines.text: A full bodied and powerful grape variety with a lot of tannin. It ages very well and like Merlot is bottled as a single varietal or used to give blended wines 'backbone' structure and longevity. Classic flavour characteristics include blackcurrant, black cherry, green pepper, chocolate and cedar wood.

wines.name: Twin Valley
wines.text: It blends flavors of black cherry, ripe plum, and oak for a velvety richness. Well-rounded and very approachable, the layers of fruit flavor give this Wine an enjoyable depth.

wines.name: Peter Vella
wines.text: Peter Vella Delicious Red earned its name for two very good reasons - its brilliant color and bright, fruity taste. Light-bodied and smooth on the palate, this wine has notes of strawberry and raspberry that are sure to please on hot summer days!

wines.name: Yellow Tail
wines.text: Peter Vella Delicious Red earned its name for two very good reasons - its brilliant color and bright, fruity taste. Light-bodied and smooth on the palate, this wine has notes of strawberry and raspberry that are sure to please on hot summer days!

wines.text: Delicious and perfect for a dinner next to the fish
